sentences.english: So long as opens the mouth to sing, lengthens until the dream, hears the echo to be resonant.
sentences.chinese: 只要開口唱，直到夢想延長，聽到迴音多嘹亮。

sentences.english: I don't know what season's singing is so loud and clear.
sentences.chinese: 不知道是什麼季節的歌聲才那麼嘹亮。

sentences.english: The whole square was alive with singing and rejoicing.
sentences.chinese: 整個廣場歌聲嘹亮，喜氣洋洋。

sentences.english: You are the most resonant song in our hearts.
sentences.chinese: 您是我們心中最嘹亮的歌。

sentences.english: In recent months, the streets of the city of Chongqing have been ringing with song.
sentences.chinese: 近幾個月來，重慶市的大街小巷歌聲嘹亮。

sentences.english: The songs remain fast and loud, totally wired and tantalizingly brief.
sentences.chinese: 快節奏嘹亮的歌曲，透露着怪異而又簡潔得讓人抓狂。

sentences.english: The National Anthem of make the welkin ring.
The cowboy is blowing his flute all day long.
sentences.chinese: 牛背上牧童的短笛，這時候也成天嘹亮地響着。

sentences.english: The audio system was supplied by Clarion.
The loud, sharp singing style in Beijing operas is attributable to what?
sentences.chinese: 京劇中高亢嘹亮的唱法是因爲什麼原因？

sentences.english: Just this moment a crowd of cowboys on the ox back are blowing their flutes sonore.
sentences.chinese: 牛背上牧童的短笛，這時候也成天在嘹亮地響。

sentences.english: The bird sang high and clearly.
How melodious the song for youth pursing!
sentences.chinese: 追逐的年輕歌聲多嘹亮。

sentences.english: Similarly, bright, generous voices can increase interpersonal attraction and receptivity toward another person.
sentences.chinese: 同樣的嘹亮大方的聲音可以增強我們的聲音吸引力。

sentences.english: Exciting people singing loudly and dancing smoothly.
sentences.chinese: 歡快的人們歌聲嘹亮，舞姿妖妖。

sentences.english: In 1, his song and mellow, no affectation.
sentences.chinese: 他的歌聲嘹亮圓潤，絲毫沒有矯揉造作之感。

definition: high-pitched and penetrating (musical instrument, voice etc)/high-spirited/fever-pitched (atmosphere)
singing voice/fig. original voice of a poet
sharp and clear/crisp/melodious/ringing/tinkling/silvery (of sound)/fragile/frail/also written 輕脆|轻脆
